TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRemoteEventInfoContract implements class System.AddIn.Contract.IContract

Docs.summary: Defines a contract that components can use to access information about an event across application domain and process boundaries.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract>提供有关的事件信息的远程对象实现<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract>接口。
若要访问的远程对象的一个或多个事件，请使用<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A>方法以获取<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract>表示远程对象的类型。 然后，调用<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetEvent%2A>或<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetEvents%2A>方法。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract GetAddMethod() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the method that was used to add an event handler delegate to the event that this identifies.
Docs.returns: An that represents the method that was used to add an event handler delegate to the event that this identifies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要添加到事件的委托，调用<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>方法<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract>，<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetAddMethod%2A>返回。 传递<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract>，表示的委托到`parameters`参数<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData GetMemberData() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns information about the event that this identifies.
Docs.returns: A that provides information about the event that this identifies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供的信息<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData>结构包括事件和声明该事件的类型的名称。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract GetRemoveMethod() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the method that was used to remove an event handler delegate from the event that this identifies.
Docs.returns: An that represents the method that was used to remove an event handler delegate from the event that this identifies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要从事件中删除委托，调用<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>方法<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract>，<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetRemoveMethod%2A>返回。 传递<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract>，表示的委托到`parameters`参数<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>。
